name: Tappy Plane: Endless flyer
description:
Tappy Plane is an endless flyer game created by Spil Games! Using a simple mechanic this game holds a lot of challenges and content to unlock!

Tappy Plane offers:
- Endless flying fun!
- Collect stars and tappers to unlock content within the game.
- Multiple environments and planes to unlock, each plane has it's own unique flying behavior.
- Store your progress safely by connecting your Facebook or Game Center account.

Give it a try now, the best endless flyer game available in the store!
